jobDescription: About Cubist  Cubist Systematic Strategies is one of the world’s premier investment firms. The firm deploys systematic, computer-driven trading strategies across multiple liquid asset classes, including equities, futures and foreign exchange. The core of our effort is rigorous research into a wide range of market anomalies, fueled by our unparalleled access to a wide range of publicly available data sources. Job Description A Cubist portfolio management team specializing in the systematic trading of equity securities is seeking a student for a full-time role during the summer of 2018. This is an opportunity to gain exposure to quantitative investing and data analysis techniques while helping to research improvements to existing processes and develop new strategies.  Job Responsibilities Research fundamentals of individual companies and sectors to aid the trading strategyBrainstorm creative uses for data in the investment processBuild systems that will improve proprietary data evaluation process Desirable Candidates Proficiency in Python or similar programming languagesPassion for investing and following marketsBasic understanding of types of investing strategiesDesire to learn about the use of data in the investment processAbility to commit to goals and deadlinesStrong communication skillsKnowledge of a particular industry/sector is a plus, but not required
